title: Nkonde Kalista
body:
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/81/Nkisi_Nkondi,_Congo,_c._1880-1920_-_IMG_1628.JPG

Has anyone made the connection between Kalista and Minkonde dolls yet? In case it hasn't, Minkonde (1 Nkonde, 2 Minkonde) dolls originated in Kongo. They are hideous dolls believed to pursue wrongdoers - specifically witches, thieves, adulterers and betrayers - at night. To activate a Nkonde, one must drive several nails, blades or other pieces of iron into it so that it will deliver the same punishment to the wrongdoer. See the connection?
